title: suite-parse requires gcc 4.9 starting in version 5.2.0
body:
Compiling suite-sparse on CentOS 7 host with gcc@4.8.5 (system gcc). When compiling suite-sparse@5.1.0 everything works as expected. When compiling suite-sparse@5.2.0 with CentOS7 system gcc, CMake says it requires at least gcc 4.9:

```
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8' 'install' 'INSTALL=/cvmfs/connect.opensciencegrid.org/modules/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/suite-sparse-5.2.0-nos5muqbfjo2jel3pa66422gnoes7xcc' 'AUTOCC=no' 'CUDA=no' 'CUDA_PATH=' 'CFOPENMP=' 'CFLAGS=-O3 -fPIC' 'FFLAGS=-fPIC' 'F77FLAGS=-fPIC' 'MY_METIS_LIB=-L/cvmfs/connect.opensciencegrid.org/modules/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/metis-5.1.0-5awv4ddhpqkvudhneldvargeikuzuibr/lib -lmetis' 'MY_METIS_INC=/cvmfs/connect.opensciencegrid.org/modules/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/metis-5.1.0-5awv4ddhpqkvudhneldvargeikuzuibr/include' 'BLAS=-L/cvmfs/connect.opensciencegrid.org/modules/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/openblas-0.3.0-iqbnxi4uu27bzl4aq6iueu3tp3ozq33q/lib -lopenblas' 'LAPACK=-L/cvmfs/connect.opensciencegrid.org/modules/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/openblas-0.3.0-iqbnxi4uu27bzl4aq6iueu3tp3ozq33q/lib -lopenblas' 'CFLAGS+=-fno-common -fexceptions'

5 errors found in build log:
     32    -- Check for working CXX compiler: /cvmfs/connect.opensciencegrid.org/modules/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++
     33    -- Check for working CXX compiler: /cvmfs/connect.opensciencegrid.org/modules/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++ -- works
     34    -- Detecting CXX compiler ABI info
     35    -- Detecting CXX compiler ABI info - done
     36    -- Detecting CXX compile features
     37    -- Detecting CXX compile features - done
  **>> 38    CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:65 (message):
     39      gcc version must be at least 4.9**
     40
     41
     42    -- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
     43    See also "/tmp/centos/spack-stage/spack-stage-9EBqAe/SuiteSparse/GraphBLAS/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
     44    make[2]: Entering directory `/tmp/centos/spack-stage/spack-stage-9EBqAe/SuiteSparse/GraphBLAS/build'
  >> 45    make[2]: *** No targets specified and no makefile found.  Stop.
     46    make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/centos/spack-stage/spack-stage-9EBqAe/SuiteSparse/GraphBLAS/build'
     47    make[2]: Entering directory `/tmp/centos/spack-stage/spack-stage-9EBqAe/SuiteSparse/GraphBLAS/build'
  >> 48    make[2]: *** No rule to make target `install'.  Stop.
     49    make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/centos/spack-stage/spack-stage-9EBqAe/SuiteSparse/GraphBLAS/build'
  >> 50    make[1]: *** [install] Error 2
     51    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/centos/spack-stage/spack-stage-9EBqAe/SuiteSparse/GraphBLAS'
  >> 52    make: *** [install] Error 2

```
